Text: Ugh.  Why the 20-some 48MB pieces?  Unnecessary extra step between downloading > watching.
stupid comment. learn before talking. he/she is following guidelines

Enough with the rar files

1 show 1 file!!!
The reason is the idiocy of the uploaders.  Simple explanation.

I have asked before why the RAR's but never received an answer.  So I skip these whenever possible and usually find another one that is not rar'd.  I don't want to support seeding these rar'd versions. It just doubles the amount of data on my hard drive if I am going to continue seeding and extract them to watch.  There is no need from them I guess that is why they have never given me an answer.
